enWisdom: In every good deed there is reward

Wisdom: لَيْسَ بِخَيْرٍ مِنَ الْخَيْرِ إِلَّا ثَوَابُهُ
enWisdom: There is nothing better than [a] good [deed] except its reward

Wisdom: لَنْ يُجْزَى جَزَاءَ الْخَيْرِ إِلَّا فَاعِلُهُ
enWisdom: Nobody will ever be given the reward of a good action except the one who performs it
The oppressed awaits reward [in the Hereafter]
